statement.p: Out of the last 49 days, it rained 6 days. What percent of these days did it rain?

solution.p: We recall that a percent is part/whole scaled by 100. Here we have \displaystyle\frac{{6}}{{49}}={0.12244897959184}. We convert this to a percent by \displaystyle{100}\cdot{0.12244897959184}={12.244897959184} . Lastly we round to two decimal places. The rounded percent is 12.24 .
